text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1896 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ; September * 29 – Johan Gottfried Conradi, composer, choir leader, and conductor (born 1820). ; December * 13 – Emma Dahl, soprano singer and Lieder composer (born 1819). ==Births== ; July * 27 – Ivar F. Andresen, operatic singer (died 1940). ; November * 3 – Trygve Lindeman, cellist and the head of the Oslo Conservatory of Music (born 1979). ; December * 30 – Hans Stenseth, flautist and flute teacher (died 1994). ==See also== * 1896 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1890s in Norwegian music
title: 1896 in Norwegian music
